title: ISic000370. I.Sicily inscription 000370
body:
Facsimile Images

[D(is) ]M(anibus) s(acrum)
[---]ntelus Seleucus
[---]ann(is) ((·)) XIII ((·)) m(ensibus) VIII ((·)) P(ublius)
[---]ntelus Seleucus pat(er)
5[---]PIO et Simbolico
[---ne]poti eius ((·)) vix(it) ((·)) an(nis) ((·)) XVI
[---]m(ensibus) VII

Apparatus criticus

Text from CIL; Mommsen : FONTEIUS opinor vel PHONTEIUS
line.4: Mommsen : FONTEIUS opinor vel PHONTEIUS

English translation

Sacred to the gods of the underworld. (...)ntelus Seleucus...(lived for) 13 years and 8 months, P(ublius)...ntelus Seleucus his father...for his...(?) and (?)...his nephew, who lived for 16 years and 7 months

commentary

bibliography

  • 10.7088 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
